author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AvalonBay Communities Qtrly FFO Per Share $2.18
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Avalonbay Communities Inc:
* AVALONBAY COMMUNITIES, INC. ANNOUNCES 2017 OPERATING RESULTS, 3.5% DIVIDEND INCREASE AND INITIAL 2018 FINANCIAL OUTLOOK
* QTRLY FFO PER SHARE $2.18 * QTRLY CORE FFO PER SHARE $2.25 * SEES FULL YEAR 2018 PROJECTED FFO PER SHARE $8.67 - $9.07
* Q1 2018 ‍PROJECTED FFO PER SHARE $2.13 - $2.19​ * SEES Q1 2018 PROJECTED EPS BETWEEN $0.99 -$1.05 * SEES FULL YEAR 2018 PROJECTED CORE FFO PER SHARE $8.73 - $9.13
* FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $9.05 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $2.22 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $2.23 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
